msbt.message: <20_2 arg="10" />That <20_2 arg="9" />is some solid placement.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I don't know who put it there, but it's PERF!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />What do you think about taking a picture in front of something like ?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Would that kind of background highlight my best features or overshadow me? Oh, don't answer.I'll just take a hundred selfies and find out for myself, !

<20_2 arg="10" />The here<20_2 arg="9" /> is, like, suuuper blending in with nature!<20_3 arg="6" />Honestly?<20_3 arg="3" /> I legit thought it was, I don't know, growing out of the ground!<10_4 /> Good work, team!

<20_2 arg="10" />Check it! When I see , it<20_2 arg="9" /> makes me feel frosty!<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Like, if somebody says to chill out? I'll say, "I'm already chiller than a diamond necklace in the wind."And they'll have to pretend like that makes sense!
<20_2 arg="10" />The ? <20_2 arg="9" />Totes the secret to giving this space <20_3 arg="6" />a WAY different vibe!<20_3 arg="3" />I mean, are we even still on our island? Who can tell?!
<20_2 arg="10" />That brings back memories.Oh. There's nothing else to say. Justthere are some memories I like to keep only for me.
<20_2 arg="10" />The<20_2 arg="9" /> really makes this place feel classy!<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />It's "antique." That means it's older than me. It's likereverse trendy. I love it!
<20_2 arg="10" />!<20_2 arg="9" /> When I was in school, I did all my homework and had straight As.You don't have any homework, do you?Any homework you should maybe be doing right now? Maybe?
<20_2 arg="10" />That <20_2 arg="9" /> gives me MAD resort vibes.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" /> I get to feel like I'm on vacation for free!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" /> would look pretty cool in my office.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Did I tell you I'm thinking about being a CEO?That stands for Cute E. Overlord! Get it? <10_4 />"Cute E." <10_4 />"Cutie"? I'm going to rule the worldADORABLY!

<20_2 arg="10" />So, log stuff like that
<20_2 arg="9" />Kind of weird, right?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Someone said, "That tree's the wrong shape!" So they cut it down and made it THIS shape
<20_2 arg="10" />. Look. At. That. . Oh. My. Gosh.<20_3 arg="3" />IT'S. SO. CUTE! Like me!

<20_2 arg="10" />That<20_2 arg="9" /> deal reminds me<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I told a friend of mine I'd send her .I should probably pick more, though. The ones I've got have been in that box for, I dunnoa month? <10_4 />Or three.

<20_2 arg="10" />That <20_2 arg="9" />toootally inspires me to make <20_3 arg="3" />the tallest veggie burger! <20_3 arg="6" />And I mean TALL. I'm talking, "You best have all your building permits in order!" kind of tall.
<20_2 arg="10" />Whose<20_2 arg="9" /> is that? Did some kid leave it?
Wow! I just saw a shell out on the beach that looks almost exactly like <20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />that !
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />It's kind of crazy that all those rings are whole years I can find my birthday if I count the rings! <20_3 arg="6" />That 's been around my whole life

<20_2 arg="10" />? <20_2 arg="9" />Love. It. No, really, I loooove it.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I mean, just look at those Bunny Day colors and that eggy design, !It's, like, 50 percent cute and 50 percent beautiful. Which makes it 100 percent cute-iful! I totes made that word up myself, but you can use it. You're welcome.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Is that, like, handmade by someone? It's strange, but I get this weird feeling of nostalgia when I look at it. <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Yeah, it's likeit makes me feel all cozy and calm and stuff, . Wait! Now I'm feeling tr√®s homesick. I don't know what's up, but maybe it's time to pay the fam a visit.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Isn't this awesome? I LOVE me .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />You know why? Because space is cool! Like, the COOLEST!Actually, for real, it's totes cold out there in space. You would need a really warm jacket, .

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />, huh? Does that mean someone on this island is getting married? <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Oh wow! I hope so! Weddings are my fave! Or, well, wedding receptions are, anyway. That's when I can finally get up in front of everyone and belt out one love song after another! I think the newlyweds like how it gives them a break from the spotlight, you know?

Today's hot topic? <20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Totes here.<20_2 arg="6" /><20_2 arg="3" />So, I don't know if "whimsy chic" was, like, a thing before, but it is definitely a THING now. First of all, it is because I say so. And second of all, <20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />it is becausejust look! It is out-of-this-world adorbs! I meanmermaids, seashells, starfish, that super-cute color palette Wait‚Äîwhat?! Guess I floated away there for a minute, .

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I've been thinking about stars and constellations and stuff because of
<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />You know, stargazing is way fun because folks made pictures out of those little dots of light in the sky. Folks even made up these wild stories about those pictures. Like, exciting stuff! I just really, really hope they make a constellation out of me one day. Then I'll be a real star, !

<20_2 arg="10" />That<20_2 arg="9" /> Who put it there?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Do you thinkit was a pirate?! Or maybe just someone who enjoys a good high-seas adventure? Well, whoever they are, they need to do a better job of holding onto their stuff, .

I was wondering where I was getting the totes intense fall vibes from. <20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Hello, ! <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I'm way into autumn chic. It's cozy. It's stylish. It's laid-back in all the best ways. In short, it's totes ME, .

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Spooky-cute is SUCH a powerful vibe combo. Nothing wears it better than !<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />OHMIGOSH! I should stitch a second vibe to my fab-ness I'll create my own Franken-vibe!Maybe fab-dorable? Or fab-sterious? Or I could double downand be fab-fabulous-lous, !
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Aww, look what someone left here. !<20_3 arg="3" /><20_3 arg="6" />Now I can't stop thinking about Toy Dayand all the fun gifts I wish it were Toy Day EVERY day.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Weird, I just got this feeling like I want to cook an entire feast. Must be <20_3 arg="3" /><20_3 arg="6" />But what would I make? Maybe with a little for dessert?Ooh, now I'm actually hungry
